title: Shaun Gladwell: excerpts from selected video works 2000-2002
abstract: Single screen video installation which transforms skateboarding tricks into a hypnotic tableaux. Effect similar to Ballet Mechanique, in its reclassification of the everyday as spectacle.
description: Gladwell describes his installations as 'speculations on political and poetic aspects of transformation within urban politics.' (2004 Proposal) Five Fragments: 1. Kickflipper: Fragments of a Ballet (2000-2001) 2. Sydney: A Guide to Recent Architecture )2000-2001) 3. Linework (2000-2001) 4. Cycles of Radical Will (Team Rivo) and (Hikaru) (2001) 5. Need for Speed (2000).
